key.name: single-window
key.description: Should we display message windows in one unified view, or separate windows?

key.name: slash-me
key.description: Should we support XEP-0245 and parse /me in message text

key.name: shift-enter-for-send
key.description: We will default to use enter for sending a message, but with this setting set, we will instead use shift-enter.

key.name: notification-style
key.summary: How much information should be contained in notifications?
key.description: This settings describes what style of notification to use - ranging from not using them at all, to showing all content.

key.name: notification-urgency
key.description: When using urgent notifications, they will be visible over fullscreen windows - but might be a bit too strong. This setting allow you to tune that behavior.

key.name: notification-expires
key.description: If you want notifications to stay on the screen until you've seen the thing that originating them, this setting allow you to tune it.
